Module gmit.software
Package ie.gmit.sw

Interface Isometricator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GameView, Isometric, PaintBoard

    public interface Isometricator

    Isometricator

    An interface to supply the methods getIsoX, getIsoY, getIso to an implementing class.
    Since:
    2018-20-12
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Kevin Gleeson

        Returns:

        Point getIso​(int x,
             int y)
        Parameters:
        x - Gets isoX
